001package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.render;
002
003import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.render.Highlight.Kind;
004import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.render.Highlight.Place;
005import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.render.Highlight.Structure;
006import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.render.Highlight.Target;
007import picocli.CommandLine;
008
009import java.util.Arrays;
010import java.util.EnumSet;
011
012public class RenderSpec {
013
014    public enum Feature {
015        SHOW_NULL,
016        SHOW_EMPTY,
017        RENDER_HTML_DOC,
018        EMBEDDED_SVG_IMG,
019        USE_HTML_CSS,
020        NESTED_SECTIONS
021    }
022
023    private final Highlight highlight;
024    private final EnumSet<Feature> featuresSet = EnumSet.noneOf(Feature.class);
025
026    public RenderSpec(Highlight highlight, Feature... featuresArr) {
027        this.highlight = highlight;
028        this.featuresSet.addAll(Arrays.asList(featuresArr));
029    }
030
031    public boolean hasFeature(Feature feature) {
032        return featuresSet.contains(feature);
033    }
034
035    public String dumpOuterHtml(String innerHTML, Structure struct) {
036        // TODO: move it to HTML-dumpers
037        String outerStyle = highlight.lookupValue(Place.of(Kind.BG, struct, Target.HTML_STYLE));
038        if (hasFeature(Feature.RENDER_HTML_DOC)) {
039            return OuterTagUtils.outerHtmlDivStyle(innerHTML, outerStyle,
040                String.format("%s as HTML (rendered by Core-Utils)", struct));
041        } else {
042            return OuterTagUtils.outerDivStyle(innerHTML, outerStyle);
043        }
044    }
045
046    public String dumpOuterSvg(String innerSVG, Structure struct, int fontSizePX, int maxRowLen, int rowsCount) {
047        // TODO: move it to SVG-dumpers
048        String outerStyle = highlight.lookupValue(Place.of(Kind.BG, struct, Target.SVG_ATTRS));
049        if (hasFeature(Feature.RENDER_HTML_DOC)) {
050            if (hasFeature(Feature.EMBEDDED_SVG_IMG)) {
051                return OuterTagUtils.outerHtmlImgSvgAttrs(
052                    innerSVG, fontSizePX, maxRowLen, rowsCount, outerStyle,
053                    String.format("%s as SVG (rendered by Core-Utils)", struct));
054            } else {
055                return OuterTagUtils.outerHtmlSvgAttrs(
056                    innerSVG, fontSizePX, maxRowLen, rowsCount, outerStyle,
057                    String.format("%s as SVG (rendered by Core-Utils)", struct));
058            }
059        } else {
060            return OuterTagUtils.outerSvgAttrs(innerSVG, fontSizePX, maxRowLen, rowsCount, outerStyle);
061        }
062    }
063
064    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
065
066    String highlightAnsi(Kind kind, Structure struct, String str) {
067        String ansiStyle = highlight.lookupValue(Place.of(kind, struct, Target.TXT_ANSI));
068        if (ansiStyle == null) {
069            return str;
070        }
071        String ansiRenderStr = String.format("@|%s %s|@", ansiStyle, str);
072        return CommandLine.Help.Ansi.AUTO.string(ansiRenderStr);
073    }
074
075    String highlightHtmlStyle(Kind kind, Structure struct, String str) {
076        String styleValue = highlight.lookupValue(Place.of(kind, struct, Target.HTML_STYLE));
077        if (styleValue == null) {
078            return str;
079        }
080        return String.format("""
081            <span style="%s">%s</span>""",
082            styleValue, str);
083    }
084
085    String highlightHtmlCss(Kind kind, Structure struct, String str) {
086        String cssClassName = highlight.lookupValue(Place.of(kind, struct, Target.HTML_CSS));
087        if (cssClassName == null) {
088            return str;
089        }
090        return String.format("""
091            <span class="%s">%s</span>""",
092            cssClassName, str);
093    }
094
095    String highlightSvgAttrs(Kind kind, Structure struct, String str) {
096        String svgAttrs = highlight.lookupValue(Place.of(kind, struct, Target.SVG_ATTRS));
097        if (svgAttrs == null) {
098            return str;
099        }
100        return String.format("""
101            <tspan %s>%s</tspan>""",
102            svgAttrs, str);
103    }
104
105    String highlightSvgClass(Kind kind, Structure struct, String str) {
106        String svgClassName = highlight.lookupValue(Place.of(kind, struct, Target.SVG_CLASS));
107        if (svgClassName == null) {
108            return str;
109        }
110        return String.format("""
111            <tspan class="%s">%s</tspan>""",
112            svgClassName, str);
113    }
114
115    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
116
117    public String highlightSyntaxAnsi(Structure struct, char syntaxSymbolChar) {
118        return highlightSyntaxAnsi(struct, String.valueOf(syntaxSymbolChar));
119    }
120
121    public String highlightSyntaxHtmlStyle(Structure struct, char syntaxSymbolChar) {
122        return highlightSyntaxHtmlStyle(struct, String.valueOf(syntaxSymbolChar));
123    }
124
125    public String highlightSyntaxHtmlCss(Structure struct, char syntaxSymbolChar) {
126        return highlightSyntaxHtmlCss(struct, String.valueOf(syntaxSymbolChar));
127    }
128
129    public String highlightSyntaxSvgAttrs(Structure struct, char syntaxSymbolChar) {
130        return highlightSyntaxSvgAttrs(struct, String.valueOf(syntaxSymbolChar));
131    }
132
133    public String highlightSyntaxSvgClass(Structure struct, char syntaxSymbolChar) {
134        return highlightSyntaxSvgClass(struct, String.valueOf(syntaxSymbolChar));
135    }
136
137    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
138
139    public String highlightSyntaxAnsi(Structure struct, String syntaxSymbol) {
140        return highlightAnsi(Kind.SYNTAX, struct, syntaxSymbol);
141    }
142
143    public String highlightSyntaxHtmlStyle(Structure struct, String syntaxSymbol) {
144        return highlightHtmlStyle(Kind.SYNTAX, struct, syntaxSymbol);
145    }
146
147    public String highlightSyntaxHtmlCss(Structure struct, String syntaxSymbol) {
148        return highlightHtmlCss(Kind.SYNTAX, struct, syntaxSymbol);
149    }
150
151    public String highlightSyntaxSvgAttrs(Structure struct, String syntaxSymbol) {
152        return highlightSvgAttrs(Kind.SYNTAX, struct, syntaxSymbol);
153    }
154
155    public String highlightSyntaxSvgClass(Structure struct, String syntaxSymbol) {
156        return highlightSvgClass(Kind.SYNTAX, struct, syntaxSymbol);
157    }
158
159    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
160
161    public String highlightNullAnsi(Structure struct) {
162        return highlightAnsi(Kind.NULL, struct, "null");
163    }
164
165    public String highlightNullHtmlStyle(Structure struct) {
166        return highlightHtmlStyle(Kind.NULL, struct, "null");
167    }
168
169    public String highlightNullHtmlCss(Structure struct) {
170        return highlightHtmlCss(Kind.NULL, struct, "null");
171    }
172
173    public String highlightNullSvgAttrs(Structure struct) {
174        return highlightSvgAttrs(Kind.NULL, struct, "null");
175    }
176
177    public String highlightNullSvgClass(Structure struct) {
178        return highlightSvgClass(Kind.NULL, struct, "null");
179    }
180
181    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
182
183    public String highlightKeyAnsi(Structure struct, String keyStr) {
184        return highlightAnsi(Kind.KEY, struct, keyStr);
185    }
186
187    public String highlightKeyHtmlStyle(Structure struct, String keyStr) {
188        return highlightHtmlStyle(Kind.KEY, struct, keyStr);
189    }
190
191    public String highlightKeyHtmlCss(Structure struct, String keyStr) {
192        return highlightHtmlCss(Kind.KEY, struct, keyStr);
193    }
194
195    public String highlightKeySvgAttrs(Structure struct, String keyStr) {
196        return highlightSvgAttrs(Kind.KEY, struct, keyStr);
197    }
198
199    public String highlightKeySvgClass(Structure struct, String keyStr) {
200        return highlightSvgClass(Kind.KEY, struct, keyStr);
201    }
202
203    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
204
205    public String highlightValueAnsi(Structure struct, String valueStr) {
206        return highlightAnsi(Kind.VALUE, struct, valueStr);
207    }
208
209    public String highlightValueHtmlStyle(Structure struct, String valueStr) {
210        return highlightHtmlStyle(Kind.VALUE, struct, valueStr);
211    }
212
213    public String highlightValueHtmlCss(Structure struct, String valueStr) {
214        return highlightHtmlCss(Kind.VALUE, struct, valueStr);
215    }
216
217    public String highlightValueSvgAttrs(Structure struct, String valueStr) {
218        return highlightSvgAttrs(Kind.VALUE, struct, valueStr);
219    }
220
221    public String highlightValueSvgClass(Structure struct, String valueStr) {
222        return highlightSvgClass(Kind.VALUE, struct, valueStr);
223    }
224
225}
